mapper.select: select id,pid as pId,simplename as name, ( CASE WHEN (pId = 0 OR pId IS NULL) THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END ) as isOpen,dept_type as deptType , ( CASE WHEN (dept_Type = 0 OR pId IS NULL) THEN 'pIcon01' ELSE 'pIcon02' END ) as iconSkin from sys_dept order by dept_type desc ,id

select id,pid as pId,simplename as name, ( CASE WHEN (pId = 0 OR pId IS NULL) THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END ) as isOpen,dept_type as deptType , ( CASE WHEN (dept_Type = 0 OR pId IS NULL) THEN 'pIcon01' ELSE 'pIcon02' END ) as iconSkin from sys_dept where level = 2 order by dept_type desc ,id

select id,pid as pId,simplename as name, ( CASE WHEN (pId = 0 OR pId IS NULL) THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END ) as isOpen,dept_type as deptType , ( CASE WHEN (dept_Type = 0 OR pId IS NULL) THEN 'pIcon01' ELSE 'pIcon02' END ) as iconSkin from sys_dept WHERE level != 4 order by dept_type desc ,id

select * from sys_dept
where simplename like CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%') or fullname like CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%')
order by sort ASC
select id from sys_dept where dept_no = #{deptNo}
SELECT RIGHT(LEFT(station_card,LENGTH(station_card)-1),7) AS cardNo FROM dept_member WHERE station_card IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(station_card)=13 ORDER BY cardNo DESC LIMIT 1

select t.id,t.id as deptNo,t.simplename as pDeptName,t.chairman,COALESCE(tmp.userCount,0) as userCount from sys_dept t left join (select count(*) as userCount,org_id from org_member group by org_id) tmp on tmp.org_id =t.id where exists (select * from (select id from sys_dept where root_flg !=1 and FIND_IN_SET(#{pDeptId},pids)) dept where t.pid=dept.id) and t.root_flg='1'

SELECT id,pId,simplename NAME, (CASE WHEN id = #{pid} THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END ) AS isOpen, dept_type AS deptType, (CASE WHEN dept_Type = 0 THEN 'pIcon01' ELSE 'pIcon02' END ) AS iconSkin FROM sys_dept WHERE (id = #{pid} or FIND_IN_SET(#{pid},pids)) ORDER BY deptType DESC,LEVEL,sort,id

SELECT id,pId,simplename NAME, 'true' AS isOpen, dept_type AS deptType, (CASE WHEN dept_Type = 0 THEN 'pIcon01' ELSE 'pIcon02' END ) AS iconSkin FROM sys_dept WHERE simplename like concat('%',#{dname},'%') ORDER BY deptType DESC,LEVEL,sort,id

select id,pId,simplename name,( CASE WHEN pId = 0 THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END ) as isOpen,dept_type as deptType, ( CASE WHEN dept_Type = 0 THEN 'pIcon01' ELSE 'pIcon02' END ) as iconSkin from sys_dept where dept_type = 0 and FIND_IN_SET(#{pid},pids) order by deptType desc,id

select sys_dept.id,sys_dept.pId, sys_dept.LEVEL, sys_dept.simplename as name, (CASE WHEN LEVEL = 8 THEN 'false' ELSE 'true' END ) as isParent, (CASE WHEN sys_dept.id = #{parentId} THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END ) as isOpen, dept_type as deptType, ( CASE WHEN dept_Type = 0 THEN 'pIcon01' ELSE 'pIcon02' END ) as iconSkin from sys_dept INNER JOIN dept_organization on sys_dept.id=dept_organization.dept_id where dept_type = 0
and sys_dept.pid = ${parentId}
and (sys_dept.pid = 1 or sys_dept.pid is NULL )
and (sys_dept.pid = #{deptId} or sys_dept.id =#{deptId} )
order by sys_dept.level,sys_dept.sort,sys_dept.id
SELECT count(0) FROM sys_dept AS d1 INNER JOIN dept_organization ON d1.id = dept_organization.dept_id WHERE d1.id=${parentId} or pids like '%,${parentId}%' or pids like '%${parentId},%'

SELECT ifnull(member_whole_count,0) as cnt, ifnull(bind_num,0) as bnt, dm.id as dept_id from sys_dept dm join t_member_count pin on pin.dept_id=dm.id where dm.id in
#{dept}

SELECT ifnull(member_count,0) as cnt, ifnull(bind_num,0) as bnt, t.dept_id, d.simplename, d.pid from t_member_count t left join sys_dept d on t.dept_id=d.id join dept_organization o on d.id=o.dept_id where t.pid = #{pid}
select pid from sys_dept where id = #{orgId}

select id,pid as pId,simplename as name, ( CASE WHEN (pId = 0 OR pId IS NULL) THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END ) as isOpen,dept_type as deptType , ( CASE WHEN (dept_Type = 0 OR pId IS NULL) THEN 'pIcon01' ELSE 'pIcon02' END ) as iconSkin from sys_dept where dept_type = '0' order by dept_type desc ,id

select sys_dept.id, (case when (pId = 0 OR pId IS NULL) THEN 0 ELSE sys_dept.pId END) as pId, sys_dept.fullname as name from sys_dept INNER JOIN dept_organization on sys_dept.id=dept_organization.dept_id where dept_type = 0 and (sys_dept.id = #{orgId} or sys_dept.pids like '%,${orgId}%' or pids like '%${orgId},%') order by sys_dept.level,sys_dept.sort,sys_dept.id
select sys_dept.id,sys_dept.simplename from sys_dept where simplename = #{orgName} limit 1
